data.title: PayPal Holdings Inc Company Profile - PayPal Holdings Inc Overview
data.meta_description: Up-to-date PayPal Holdings Inc company overview including funding information, company profile, key statistics, peer comparison and more.
data.text: PayPal Holdings Inc (PayPal) is a technology platform that allows digital payments and simplifies commerce experiences. The company's main activities involve managing and moving money for individuals and businesses and offering a range of payment solutions including person-to-person payments. PayPal's major services include proprietary payment solutions, authorization and settlement capabilities, and instant access to funds and payouts. PayPal is associated with notable brands such as Braintree, Venmo, and Xoom. PayPal's services are used by consumers and merchants across various industries for online and in-person transactions, and for sending and receiving payments. The company operates a global, two-sided network that connects merchants and consumers. PayPal is headquartered in San Jose, California, the US.
